title: Bug 8142 - No Scoped Type Hierarchy on Binary Projects
description: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection, the scoped type hierarchy is missing.
OB: The scoped type hierarchy on binary projects is not displayed when pressing F4.
EB: The scoped type hierarchy on binary projects should be displayed when pressing F4.
SR: Investigate and fix the issue causing the absence of the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects when F4 is pressed.
